subject: Please help this novice!!!Please
msgSnippet: Hi All, Iam totally new to the junit field. Ihave installed the junit software. The jar file is in the directory c: junit junit3.8 junit.jar. I have written a
messageBody:
Hi All,
Iam totally new to the junit field. Ihave installed the junit
software. The jar file is in the directory c:\junit\junit3.8
\junit.jar.

I have written a simple program which should test the program.
The program reads as follows

1. The Programto be tested

This is stored as Fibonacci.java in thedirectory c:\junit\junit3.8
class Fibonacci {
int compute (int n) {
if (n<2) return n;//bug; should be "1"
else return compute(n-1)+compute(n-2);
}
}


2. The program which tests the above program
This is stored as TestFibonacci.java

import junit.framework.*;

public class TestFibonacci extends TestCase {
Fibonacci f;

public TestFibonacci(String name) {
super(name);
}

public void setUp(){
f=new Fibonacci();
}

public static Test suite() {
return new TestSuite(TestFibonacci.class);
}

public void test1() {
assertTrue(f.compute(1)==1);
}

public void test2() {
assertTrue(f.compute(4)==5);
}
//starte text interface und lass die tests laufen.
public static void main(String args[]) {
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite());
}

}

The Steps i am follwing to compile the program are
1. javac Fibonacci.java
2. Then i compile TestFibonacci.java..i get the following errors...
/************Errors i am getting*********************************/
C:\junit\junit3.8\TestFibonacci.java:1: package junit.framework does
not exist
import junit.framework.*;
^
C:\junit\junit3.8\TestFibonacci.java:3: cannot resolve symbol
symbol : class TestCase
location: class TestFibonacci
public class TestFibonacci extends TestCase {
^
C:\junit\junit3.8\TestFibonacci.java:14: cannot resolve symbol
symbol : class Test
location: class TestFibonacci
public static Test suite() {
^
C:\junit\junit3.8\TestFibonacci.java:15: cannot resolve symbol
symbol : class TestSuite
location: class TestFibonacci
return new TestSuite(TestFibonacci.class);
^
C:\junit\junit3.8\TestFibonacci.java:19: cannot resolve symbol
symbol : method assertTrue (boolean)
location: class TestFibonacci
assertTrue(f.compute(1)==1);
^
C:\junit\junit3.8\TestFibonacci.java:23: cannot resolve symbol
symbol : method assertTrue (boolean)
location: class TestFibonacci
assertTrue(f.compute(4)==5);
^
C:\junit\junit3.8\TestFibonacci.java:27: package junit.textui does
not exist
junit.textui.TestRunner.run(suite());
^
7 errors
/*******************************************************************/

Please helpme with this as i have been working onthisfor a longtime
and still unable to solve the mystery.
Thanks foryour help in advance
Regards,
Vivek
